semaphore

Interface SemaphoreInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinarySemaphore, BlockingSemaphore, LocalSemaphore, Semaphore

    public interface SemaphoreInterface
    A semaphore interface that matches the method names used in the lecture.
    Version:
    January 2020
    Author:
    Hugh Osborne

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get this semaphore's name.
      void poll()
      Check if the value of the semaphore is greater than zero.
      void vote()
      Check if any processes are waiting on this semaphore.

    • Method Detail

      • poll

        void poll()
   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Check if the value of the semaphore is greater than zero.
        • If it is, decrease it by one and continue.
        • If it is not, wait for a signal from a vote(), which may allow you to continue.
        If the current thread:
        • has its interrupted status set on entry to this method; or
        • is interrupted while waiting for a permit,
        then InterruptedException is thrown and the current thread's interrupted status is cleared.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted.

      • vote

        void vote()
   throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
          SemaphoreError
        Check if any processes are waiting on this semaphore.
        • If so, wake one of the waiting processes.
        • If not, increase the value of this semaphore by one.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - (for blocking bounded semaphores) The current thread was interrupted. If this is an implementation of a blocking bounded semaphore, then the semaphore may wait on a vote when it has reached its maximum value. If it does, an InterruptedException could be raised, and the current thread's interrupted status cleared, if the current thread:
        • has its interrupted status set on entry to this method; or
        • is interrupted while waiting for a permit,
        SemaphoreError - (for crashing bounded semaphores) Increasing the semaphore's value would take it beyond the semaphore's maximum permitted value.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get this semaphore's name.
        Returns:
        the name of this semaphore.
